data.comment: The match is underway in Sochi.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 2, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sochi's Christian Noboa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
In the minute 3, Khimki to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Khimki, close to Sochi's area.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a Sochi throw-in in Khimki's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Khimki have a dangerous throw-in.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Khimki.
Throw-in for Sochi close to the penalty box.
In the minute 10, Sergey Karasev awards Khimki a goal kick.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Khimki close to the penalty box.
Khimki's Artem Polyarus breaks free at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Khimki.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Dmitri Poloz (Sochi) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 14, Sochi's Dmitri Poloz is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 17, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Goal kick for Khimki at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Khimki.
Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
Sergey Karasev awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Sochi's Christian Noboa misses with an attempt on goal.
Khimki have a goal kick.
Sergey Karasev signals a Khimki throw-in in Sochi's half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Khimki.
In the minute 23, Dmitri Poloz (Sochi) has received a yellow card from Sergey Karasev.
Sergey Karasev waits before resuming play because Maksim Martusevich for Khimki is still down.
In the minute 24, Maksim Martusevich is back on his feet again.
Aleksandr Troshechkin is on target to give Khimki a 0-1 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Brian Idowu.
In the minute 26, Sergey Karasev signals a Khimki throw-in in Sochi's half.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 27, Free kick Sochi.
Sochi's Nikita Burmistrov attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
In the minute 28, Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Khimki.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 31, Sergey Terekhov (Sochi) gets a yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Khimki.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sochi to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
In the minute 38, Vladimir Dyadyun gets his shot on target but fails to score for Khimki.
Throw-in for Khimki at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 41, Sergey Terekhov (Sochi) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Khimki are coming forward and Brian Idowu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Khimki.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 45, Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Khimki are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Sochi Khimki attack through Maksim Martusevich. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Sochi have a goal kick.
The first-half is over at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Sergey Karasev has blown to start the second-half.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
In the minute 46, Zhoazino is on a sub for Nikita Burmistrov for Sochi.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Sergey Terekhov for Sochi gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
Throw-in for Khimki at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 49, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladimir Dyadyun for Khimki has been booked by Sergey Karasev and receives a first yellow card.
Miha Mevlja is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 50, Sochi’s Miha Mevlja is on his feet again at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Khimki needs to be cautious. Sochi have an attacking throw-in.
Artem Polyarus of Khimki gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 51, Sergey Karasev awards Sochi a goal kick.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Khimki.
Artem Polyarus (Khimki) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 55, Free kick Sochi.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
At Fisht Olympic Stadium, Kirill Bozhenov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Kamran Aliev for Khimki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sergey Karasev awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 57, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Anton Zabolotnyi is replacing Dmitri Poloz for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 58, Sochi surge into the attack at Fisht Olympic Stadium but Anton Zabolotnyi’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
Andrey Bokovoy is replacing Aleksandr Rudenko for the home team.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 61, Attention is being given to Sochi’s Anton Zabolotnyi and play has been suspended briefly.
Khimki pushes forward through Arshak Koryan, whose finish on goal is saved.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 63, Arshak Koryan of Khimki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sochi's Anton Zabolotnyi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Goal! Sochi go level at 1-1 through Christian Noboa in Sochi.
In the minute 63, Kirill Zaika instrumental with a fine assist.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Sochi.
In the minute 66, Khimki have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 66, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Sochi make their fourth substitution with Emanuel Mammana replacing Ivan Miladinovic.
Sochi are pushing forward but Anton Zabolotnyi's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
In the minute 68, Sochi to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Sochi drives forward and Christian Noboa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal kick for Khimki at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 70, Free kick in a good position for Sochi!
Dmitri Gunko is making the team's first substitution at Fisht Olympic Stadium with Mohamed Konate replacing Vladimir Dyadyun.
The away team replace Arshak Koryan with Danil Lipovoy.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Can Sochi capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 73, Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sochi are whistled for offside.
Anton Zabolotnyi for Sochi drives towards goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 77, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Alesandr Lomovitskiy is replacing Artem Polyarus for the away team.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 78, Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sochi to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, In Sochi Sochi drive forward through Ibrahim Tsallagov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Khimki push upfield but Sergey Karasev quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 84, Khimki's Kamran Aliev misses with an attempt on goal.
Sochi have a goal kick.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Sochi.
In the minute 85, Khimki have a goal kick.
Maksim Martusevich is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Maksim Martusevich is back on the pitch.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Khimki close to the penalty box.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Throw-in Sochi.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 89, The away team has substituted Maksim Martusevich with Andrey Murnin. Dmitri Gunko is thus making his fourth change.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Sochi.
Danil Lipovoy of Khimki gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Brian Idowu (Khimki) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Sergey Karasev awards the away team a throw-in.
